ValidationRule.description: Required Fields Number of Vets, Current PIMS, Timeline for Decision,when changing stage from 'Qualification' to 'Discovery' CCRM-41. Updated via CCRM-2128 for stage name change.Updated for CCRM-4014.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $RecordType.Name = "Technology", ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Presentation"), OR(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "GPM"),CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "GSS")) , (ISBLANK( Number_of_Vets__c ) || ISBLANK( Current_PIMS__c ) || ISBLANK( Timeline_for_Decision__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to move out of Stage “Discovery”, you must fill out the following fields: Number of Vets, Current PIMS, Timeline for Decision
